nodes.documentation: Event triggered for every registered buyer
nodes.name: BuyerRegistered

nodes.documentation: Event triggered for every new order
nodes.name: OrderSent

nodes.documentation: Event triggerd when the order gets valued and wants to know the value of the payment
nodes.name: PriceSent

nodes.documentation: Event trigger when the buyer performs the safepay
nodes.name: SafepaySent

nodes.documentation: Event triggered when the seller sends the invoice
nodes.name: InvoiceSent

nodes.documentation: Event triggered when the courie delives the order
nodes.name: OrderDelivered

nodes.documentation: The smart contract's constructor

The function to send purchase orders
   requires fee
   Payable functions returns just the transaction object, with no custom field.
   To get field values listen to OrderSent event.
nodes.name: sendOrder

nodes.documentation:
The function to query orders by number
   Constant functions returns custom fields
nodes.name: queryOrder

nodes.documentation:
The function to send the price to pay for order
  Just the owner can call this function
  requires free
nodes.name: sendPrice

nodes.documentation:
The function to send the value of order's price
  This value will be blocked until the delivery of order
  requires fee
nodes.name: sendSafepay

nodes.documentation:
The function to send the invoice data
  requires fee
nodes.name: sendInvoice

nodes.documentation:
The function to get the sent invoice
  requires no fee
nodes.name: getInvoice

nodes.documentation: The function to mark an order as delivered
nodes.name: delivery

delivery(uint256,uint256).notice: The function to mark an order as delivered

getInvoice(uint256).notice: The function to get the sent invoice  requires no fee

queryOrder(uint256).notice: The function to query orders by number   Constant functions returns custom fields

sendInvoice(uint256,uint256,address).notice: The function to send the invoice data  requires fee

sendOrder(string,uint256).notice: The function to send purchase orders   requires fee   Payable functions returns just the transaction object, with no custom field.   To get field values listen to OrderSent event.

sendPrice(uint256,uint256,int8).notice: The function to send the price to pay for order  Just the owner can call this function  requires free

sendSafepay(uint256).notice: The function to send the value of order's price  This value will be blocked until the delivery of order  requires fee
